title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: May 16, 2018 / 8:39 PM / Updated an hour ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read May 17 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Men's Singles matches on Wednesday .. Seeds ..
